participant_abstract.sent: I began the meeting by introducing the project (design and marketing of a new remote control), then we spent some time getting acquainted using the task of drawing our favorite animal and discussing what qualities of the animal we admired.
After that, we discussed the financing of the project and projected selling price and profit.

Then we discussed our experiences with remote controls and determined what factors were important in the design (i.e. ergonomics, functionality with multiple players, battery, instruction book, and a high tech appearance).
